title: Taking your Hackathon Project to the Next Level
description: Your adventure doesn't stop when the hackathon ends. Learn how you can maximize your project's full potential beyond the hackathon.

title: How to Create a Job-Ready Resume
description: Nervous about taking up your first job adventure? Don't fret, this workshop will teach out all you need to know about preparing your resume.

title: Team Formation
description: Find a team to bring your project ambitions to life!

title: _____ x Tech - The Interdisciplinary Nature of Tech
host: Vicki Lau, Abigayle Peterson, Nia Asemota, Jacky Huang, and Mieko Kawasaki
description: Want to work with tech, but not in tech? This panel showcases individuals who take a different spin with tech and turn it into their own powerful tools!

title: Building a Project for Your Resume with Python
description: Want to build experience before taking you first adventure? You'll learn how to use Python to create a project to show off to your potential employer!

title: Guide to Preparing for Your Interview
description: Nervous about taking up your first job adventure? Don't fret, this workshop will teach out all you need to know about preparing for that scary interview.

title: How to Develop a Minimum Viable Product
description: MVP? Minimum Viable Product! Although a mysterious word used in the world of tech, you'll soon learn it's not that mysterious at all.

title: Team Formation
description: Find a team to bring your project ambitions to life!

title: How did I Get to Where I Am - An Entrepreneur's Guide
host: Janice Dru-Bennet, Jasmine Lawrence, and Enrique Torres
description: Wonder how entrepreneurs become successful running their business in the vicious and cut-throat tech space? Tune into these panelists to learn about their journey to becoming successful business leaders.

title: Data 101 - Analytics, Science and Engineering
host: Wanxin Ye, Leila Ouellaj, and My Nguyen
description: Data where? Data everywhere! Here at Data 101, you'll get to meet people working in all different data industries and roles!

title: Diversity in Tech
host: Wendy Cukier, Muna Khayyat, Srujani Kamineni, and Manjiri Tapaswi
description: Wanting to venture into tech, but you don't see many that are like you? Come and meet people from different underrepresented backgrounds who are thriving in tech!

title: Career Fair
Guide to Machine Learning For Your Project
description: If you want to spice up your project, don't walk but run to this workshop where we'll teach you how to implement machine learning to your projects!

title: Ethics in Tech
host: Doaa Abu-Elyounes, Shalaleh Rismani, Briony Swire-Thompson, and Samamtha Weiner
description: As consumers of tech, it's vital to be socially and ethically conscious of what we're taking in. Join this panel to learn the ethical issues surrounding tech and why it's so important.

title: Using Tech to Impact Your Community
host: Megan Cui, Abbey Mui, Danielle Egan, and Anjali
description: Want to know how the future leaders of tech think? Join this panel that features non-profit leaders using tech to impact their community!

title: MLH Fun Activity: Bob Ross
App Development 101 with Swift
description: Want to build an app, but don't know where to start? Prepare to get 'Swift'-ed away in this workshop where you'll learn how to start building an app with Swift.

title: How to Build a Professional Portfolio
description: Nervous about taking up your first job adventure? Don't fret, this workshop will teach out all you need to know about preparing a bomb portfolio!

title: Intro to Augmented Reality
description: Inspired by Pokemon Go's AR? Take up this workshop to learn more about AR technology and how to use it in your projects.

title: Design Thinking 101 by Pegasystems
How to Develop a Product Sense
description: Don't know how to start using data to create an impact? This workshop will give you an insight into how data can truly empower products and humans.

title: Networking Beyond LinkedIn
description: You're probably not using LinkedIn right with all those failed connections. Take this workshop to learn how you can better network within and beyond LinkedIn.
